001package com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.util;
002
003import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.api.server.ServerShutdownStreamException;
004import org.reactivestreams.Processor;
005import org.reactivestreams.Subscriber;
006import org.reactivestreams.Subscription;
007
008import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
009
010/**
011 * Processor that tracks the state of the stream with a CompletableFuture.
012 * <p>
013 * Can either be triggered by the future, or complete the future itself.
014 *
015 * @param <T>
016 */
017public class FutureProcessor<T>
018        implements Processor<T, T>, Subscription, AutoCloseable {
019    private final CompletableFuture<Void> result;
020    private Subscriber<? super T> subscriber;
021    private Subscription subscription;
022
023    public FutureProcessor(CompletableFuture<Void> result) {
024        this.result = result;
025        result.whenComplete(this::whenComplete);
026    }
027
028    public CompletableFuture<Void> getResult() {
029        return result;
030    }
031
032    public synchronized Subscriber<? super T> getSubscriber() {
033        return subscriber;
034    }
035
036    public synchronized Subscription getSubscription() {
037        return subscription;
038    }
039
040    private synchronized void whenComplete(Void result, Throwable throwable) {
041        cancel();
042    }
043
044    // Publisher
045    @Override
046    public synchronized void subscribe(Subscriber<? super T> subscriber) {
047        this.subscriber = subscriber;
048        if (subscription != null)
049            subscriber.onSubscribe(this);
050        else if (result.isDone()) {
051            try {
052                result.join();
053                subscriber.onComplete();
054            } catch (Exception e) {
055                subscriber.onError(e.getCause());
056            }
057        }
058    }
059
060    // Subscriber
061    @Override
062    public synchronized void onSubscribe(Subscription subscription) {
063        this.subscription = subscription;
064        if (result.isDone()) {
065            subscription.cancel();
066        } else if (subscriber != null)
067            subscriber.onSubscribe(this);
068    }
069
070    @Override
071    public synchronized void onNext(T item) {
072        subscriber.onNext(item);
073    }
074
075    @Override
076    public synchronized void onError(Throwable throwable) {
077        if (subscriber != null)
078        {
079            subscription = null;
080            subscriber.onError(throwable);
081        }
082        if (!result.isDone())
083            result.completeExceptionally(throwable);
084    }
085
086    @Override
087    public synchronized void onComplete() {
088        if (subscriber != null)
089        {
090            subscription = null;
091            subscriber.onComplete();
092        }
093        if (!result.isDone())
094            result.complete(null);
095    }
096
097    // Subscription
098    @Override
099    public void request(long n) {
100        Subscription sub = subscription;
101        if (sub != null) {
102            sub.request(n);
103        }
104    }
105
106    @Override
107    public void cancel() {
108        Subscription sub = subscription;
109        if (sub != null) {
110            subscription = null;
111            sub.cancel();
112        }
113        if (!result.isDone())
114            result.cancel(true);
115    }
116
117    // Closeable
118    @Override
119    public synchronized void close() {
120        if (subscriber != null)
121        {
122            Subscriber<? super T> sub = subscriber;
123            subscriber = null;
124            cancel();
125            ServerShutdownStreamException exception = new ServerShutdownStreamException("shutdown");
126            sub.onError(exception);
127        }
128//        cancel();
129    }
130}
